titles: These are to give notice to all that occasionally are concerned herein viz. Book-sellers, stationers, printers, mathematisians [sic], and drawers painters ... and all other persons that use woodden prints for what use soever ...
author: Willson, John fl. 1700.
notes: Title from caption and first line of text.
Place of publication from internal evidence.
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Signed at end: John Willson Joyner.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
keywords: Joiners --  Great Britain --  London --  Early works to 1800.
